transcript:
Customer: Har Har Mahadev.

Hello?
Executive: Namaskar sir, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke head office se.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan boliye. Haan ji sir, namaskar Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke head office se. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan boliye. Badhiya.
Executive: Sir aapne IndiaMART pe services run kar rahi hai na sir present time mein?
Customer: Sir usme kuch response aata nahi toh kya fayda? Band hi kar dega.
Executive: Sir toh response, theek hai aap keh rahe ho mere ko response nahi aa raha. Sir toh aapne starting ke do mahine use kiye. Do mahine apne ko promotion hota hai sir. Do mahine mein jab toh hamara promotion hua uske baad aapko jab teesre mahine acche se use matlab use karna tha jahan pe aapko business milta. Sir aapne ekdum hi band kar diya fir. Fir uske baad aap sir September mein aapne use karna start kiya. Toh sir aise up down up down rakhenge toh sirf wohi cheez hoga na sir. Uspe ek effect aaega na sir.
Main maan raha hu aapko wahan se inquiries jo hain aur jo calls hain jo bilkul aapko mil nahi rahi thi. Theek hai. Starting mein kya hota hai apna promotion hota hai kyunki starting mein apni team ko ya fir kisi ko nahi pata rehta ki aap wahan par visit kar rahe ho ya fir business kar rahe ho. Theek hai sir. Toh starting mein aapko woh woh handling karna pada hoga. Theek hai main woh manta hu. Lekin sir uske baad jab aap use karne lage the toh is time pe sir main dekh raha tha sir aap acche se use kar rahe the sir aapne matlab 18 din bhi use kiya. Fir uske baad bilkul hi use karna band kar diya. Jaise June mein aapne use karna start kiya. Theek hai sir? June mein aapne acche se use kiya. July mein aapne acche se use kiya. Fir August mein bilkul band kar diya aapne use karna.
Ye toh aapki ek online dukaan ki tarah hai na sir. Jaise main ek baat keh raha hu aapko. Aapki ek online dukaan jaise hoti hai. Waise aapki ek online dukaan hai. Agar aapne usko open kar rakha hai toh obviously baat hai log aaenge saamne se aur aap agar apna advertisement kar rahe ho, apni query de rakhi hai wahan pe aap baat kar rahe ho toh woh alag cheez hai. Lekin agar aap yahan dekho sir ki aapko business nahi aa raha toh main ye aapko kahunga ki sir aapne paanch mahine mein sirf do mahine use kiye services. Uske baad jab aapka promotion ho gaya tha us time pe aapne service use karna hi band kar diya.
Kya hota hai na sir dekhiye main samjhata hu. IndiaMART pe aisa hota hai ki starting ke jab aap starting mein aap active hote ho, live hote ho tab hamare jo buyers hain unhe nahi pata rehta ki aap usme deal kar rahe ho, aap kaise deal kar rahe ho, kya deal kar rahe ho usme. Toh aap unko approach karoge na first time. Jab aapne approach kar liya uske baad aapka kaam tha ki aap bas ab saamne se response ka aapka time tha. Sir do mahine aapne acche se use kiya. Teesre mahine mein aapko response dikhne lagta. Jab response dikhne ka time tha toh aapne August mein bilkul use nahi kiya. Fir aapne ek mahina chhod September mein use kiya. September mein jab aapne use kiya sir toh us time pe wohi hua response bilkul ghat gaya. Ye reason raha sir.
Main kya hai ki sir apna ek specific hai na jisme aap deal karte ho. Ek specific product hai jisme main deal karta hu. Hai na? Aisa toh hai nahi ki hum all bahut zyada deal karte hain. Aur aap sir Gujarat mein sirf deal karte hain aur all over India pe deal karte hain is product line ke liye?
Customer: All over India.
Executive: Hum log all over India pe karte hain. Dehydrated fried onion hai sir. In sab mein aur dehydrated toasted onion in sab mein agar main deal karta hu toh sir all over India pe agar aap deal kar rahe hain toh sir thoda toh time lagega na all over India pe aapko.
Customer: [inaudible] lewa ja.
Executive: Ji sir?
Main ye keh raha hu sir ki all over India pe agar aap chaah rahe ho deal karna toh all over India pe sir aapke jo all over India pe log already baithe hue hain unse apna competition hai. Theek hai? Toh sir jahan bhi agar competition hoga jaahir si baat hai wahan thoda toh sir rahega ki aapko thoda time lagega. Sir business bhi jaise aapne offline bhi apna start kiya hoga toh starting mein aapko do ya teen mahine mein result dikhne nahi laga hoga na sir. Main ye nahi keh raha hu aap pura time do lekin aap thoda toh time do.
Aur aapne ek saal ki service service ke liye paisa diya hai na sir. Aisa toh hai nahi ki paanch mahine ya fir do mahine ki service ke liye paisa diya tha.
Hmm. Sir main dekh raha tha ki aap desktop se use kar rahe ho. Theek hai? Aap desktop se use karte ho ya fir laptop ya fir laptop se ya fir apne computer se aap use karte the. Aap mobile se bhi use karo sir jaise aap bahut acche se active the starting ke do mahine se. Teesre mahine jab aapko result milne ka time tha us time mein aapne use karna band kar diya. Toh aise thodi hoga ki sir main jab matlab maine do mahine badhiya se business mein time diya us time.
Customer: Sir usme inquiry jo rehta hai na inquiry pe phone daalte hain karte hain toh usko fake hi rehta hai. Bole hum log toh inquiry dala hi nahi aisa bolta hai usme.
Executive: Sir dekhiye, main ki inquiry pe aap karte ho na main batau aapko ek cheez kyun aisa hota hai? Kyunki us inquiry pe already uski kisi aur se baat ho gayi hai. 90% cases mein ye hota hai ki aap aapke pehle bhi jaise aap inquiry pe aap call kiye jaise aapko inquiry jaise aayi aap agar maan lo aapko 10 minute ke andar mein aayi hai aapne usse kiya toh wahan pe ek alag baat hogi. Lekin agar koi inquiry aapne baad mein dal rakhi hai uske baad ek ghante do ghante baad aap usse baat kar rahe ho. Ho sakta hai aapke pehle kisi aur ne kyunki sir price ka dekha jaaye aapke competitor aur aapne price mein zyada difference hai nahi. Agar ₹10 ka samaan hai koi ₹9 mein bechega koi ₹11 mein bechega. Hai na? Toh uske hisab se jaise aap ho sir waise paanch se chaar log aur connect kar rahe hain. Toh un chaaron mein se bhi toh woh kisi se bhi discuss karke pehle hi le sakta hai sir. Agar aap wahan pe late gaye ye competition ki baat hai na sir. Ki ab yahan pe toh ye hai na ki saamne rakha hua hai ab hume jo jitna jaldi buyer ko catch kar le woh cheez hai na sir. Aapka maine catalog dekha bahut acche se bana rakhe ho. Saari cheeze aap acche se isme explain kiya hua hai. Sab cheez hai. Toh sir agar itna acche se aapka sab presentation itna accha hai toh us us hisab se sir service use kariye. Aapne bola dekho abhi main aapse baat kar raha hu toh dheere dheere pata chal raha hai na aapne inquiry pe baat kahi. Inquiry mein ye ye cheeze aa rahi hain. Toh wohi cheez hai na sir at least ek baar baat karenge tab na hum woh cheez clarify kar paenge. Hai na?
Maine last time bhi jab aapse baat ki thi toh ho gaya sir last time dedh mahine pehle baat hui thi aapse. Tab aapne kaha tha ki mujhe koi bhi other cheezon ki requirement nahi hai. Main jitne abhi present time mein work kar raha hu main isi mein work karunga. Aur mujhe yahan se thoda moda business jo mil raha hai mil raha hai. Aap sahi baat hui thi sir meri. Mujhe last time yaad hai. Lekin ho gaya sir dedh mahine ho gaye hain lamsam aapse last time baat ki hui. Isi liye maine call kiya ki at least sir se baat toh ho. Main regular call karta hu. Aisa nahi hai abhi call kiya. Main morning se aapko lagatar try kar raha hu ki ek baar at least baat ho sir se.
Sir dekhiye main main maan raha hu ki aapko inquiries jo hain woh kam aa rahi hain. Jo jis jisna aapko expectation starting mein diya gaya tha ki aapko roz roz call time roz inquiries aaengi. Sir agar aap all over India pe bhi kar rahe ho chalo all over India chodo sir Gujarat mein. Gujarat mein apna area jo hai us area mein bhi kitne log honge sir jo usme deal kar rahe hain. Toh pehle hum unpe toh aage badhe apne state mein hi aage nahi badhe hum all over India ki by leads fir inquiries kaise laenge. By leads fir inquiries ke liye hamari visibility honi chahiye us area mein. Main bahut zyada vast baat kar raha hu sir. Pehle aap cheezon ko samjho na sir thoda sa dekho sir of on business kaise karna hai ye main aapko nahi bata sakta woh aap mujhse bahut acche se jaante hain sir. Lekin aapko IndiaMART pe business kaise karna hai woh toh main aapko guide kar sakta hu. Wohi guide karne ke liye main yahan pe hu lekin aap mera phone uthaenge tab na sir?
Haan. Sir main yahi request karunga ki sir ye jo hai na at least apna use kariye sir services. Services sir do mahine use karke fir chhod dena fir uske baad ek mahine band kar dena fir agle mahine use karna aise consistently nahi rahenge toh sir obviously aapka jo abhi paanch mahine ka jo experience kharab hua hai aage jaake jo baaki ke aapke services ke hain woh saare bhi experience kharab honge. Fir aapka IndiaMART se hi bharosa uth jaega. Kya matlab aise jagah aane ka?
Thik hai main. Aur aisa hai nahi ki sir yahan pe business nahi hai. Bahut saare alag alag companies ke log hain jo yahan pe business karte hain.
Hmm. Hai na sir? Aisa nahi hai sir aapko bhi pata hoga sir aap bhi market mein dekh rahe ho sir. Market mein log IndiaMART se business la rahe hain. Aapke bahut saare aise competitors hain jo yahan pe business kar rahe hain sir. Ya hum agar business nahi kar pa rahe hain toh kuch na kuch dikkat ho rahi hai. Bas wohi coordination ka dikkat hai sir. Toh ek baar lag ke karte hain nahi hoga toh uske baad dekho sir aapne waise hi band kar rakha hai. Sir aapka ek query tha service and related se issues woh main usko close kar de raha hu kyunki aapse meri baat nahi hui thi. Aapka call aaya tha na maine pick nahi kiya tha. Toh woh ek query query thi usko main band kar de raha hu aur main aapko kal dobara connect karunga. Try kariega sir aur sir aap apna ek time bata dijiye jis time pe aap free hote hain. Koi bhi time hoga. Yahi time hai? Isi time pe aap free rehte ho?
Han ji sir. Hello? Theek hai sir. Ek kaam karte hain abhi aap free ho toh abhi aap free ho toh sir main ek ek cheez bolna chahunga ki aapka jo catalog hai na sir usme do teen cheeze increase karane layak hain. Jaise main jo main dekh raha tha kuch mein specification jaise apna 23 product aapne dal rakha hai yahan pe toh is 23 product mein deal karte hain ki iske alawa bhi aur product hain?
Han wohi zyada karke toh wohi hai.
Zyadatar yahi hai. Iske alawa nahi honge matlab jaise kya hai na sir aap jaante ho ki aap kitne product mein deal karte ho. Aapka jo buyer hai usse nahi pata woh toh aapka catalog dekhega fir wahan se jitna product dikhe kya ho sakta hai woh sirf ek dehydrated onion ke liye hi aaya ho uske baad aapke alag alag products ke dekhe usko samjh mein aaega accha aap ispe bhi deal karte ho isme bhi deal karte ho. Toh jitna zyada aapke product add hoga utna zyada inquiry aur calls aati hain hume. Aise hota hai IndiaMART pe. Inquiries and calls ke liye sir zyada aapko active rehna padega. Jaise jo saamne se jo aati hai na baatein jaise kya hota hai ek hota hai by leads jo jahan pe hum approach karte hain buyer ke paas aur dusra hota hai inquiries aur calls jo saamne se aati hain. Aapko calls aur inquiries aati hain lekin aapki visibility us hisab se banti tab do mahina mein aapne visibility maintain ki fir aapko jab ekdum sahi samay pe use karne ka time aaya aapne band kar diya sir. Ye ek dikkat ho gayi. Chaliye theek hai jo paas nahi hua wahan pe main kuch nahi kar paunga lekin abhi present time mein main aapke saath hu toh main aapko recommend karunga ki regular basis pe kam se kam sir ek per day ka do ya teen by leads consume kariye taaki aapko yahan se aapki visibility maintain ho. Tab wahan se business milega kyunki saal bhar ka aapne paisa de rakha hai na aisa toh hai nahi ki do mahine ka aapne paisa de rakha tha.
Han thik hai thik hai. Thik hai sir? Haan. Sir mujhe lag raha hai main thoda zyada bol diya hounga toh sorry uske liye lekin main ye main aapko. Nahi nahi nahi sir aap mere liye sir bol rahe hain na aisa thodi hai main. Haan. Ji sir agar agar bol rahe hain toh mere liye bol rahe hain na jaisa. Hmm. Sir main matlab maine ho sakta hai maine thoda idhar udhar keh diya toh uske liye main bol raha hu main. Agar kuch bhi aisa laga ho toh sorry but sir thoda sa use kariye. Nahi nahi aap barabar hi bole sir. Aap barabar hi bole sir usme kya hai. Haan ji. Thoda hum log ka bhi kya production mein hum log zyada dhyan de rahe hain isme thoda kam de rahe hain magar kuch karte hain chalo theek hai.
Thik hai sir thik hai. Ye aapka WhatsApp number bhi hai na WhatsApp pe bhi maine message kiya tha. Thik hai ek kaam karunga WhatsApp pe agar mere side se rahega toh main kuch by leads bhi share kar dunga taaki aap consume kar liya kariye taaki aapka kam se kam aap active dikhenge. Thik hai sir ye bhi main kar sakta hu. Thik thik thik. Baaki aap mobile mein login kar lijiyega apna isi number jaise aapka jo primary number hai sir yahan pe usse login kar lijiyega taaki kam se kam aap active dikhe yahan pe. Regular basis pe aap active dikhenge toh us hisab se jo aapka sir 185 wala number hai na sorry 815 wala. Haan us number se IndiaMART pe login main bata raha hu 815 last mein hai 815. Hmm hmm. Usse aapka account hai. Thik hai toh uspe us usse login kar lijiyega uske baad aap mobile pe bhi use kar sakte hain. Thik hai? Jo aap laptop pe ab bakaida time de rahe the utna aap mobile pe bhi aaram se use kar sakte hain aisa rahega. Aur aap consume bhi kar paenge by leads woh alag cheez hai. Thik hai sir?
Hmm hmm. Chaliye thik hai sir abhi aapka jo concern tha woh main close kar de raha hu. Thik hai sir? Kya? Aapse baat ho gayi aapka ek concern tha jaise aapka service related concern ek aaya tha hamare paas toh woh main close kar de raha hu kyunki aapke aur meri present time mein baat ho gayi hai. Thik hai aur sir ye hamara jo conversation abhi hua hai sir iska ek feedback aaega aapke paas. Thik hai? Toh usme sir satisfy mark kar dijiyega please woh mere liye rahega sir. Thik hai? Thik thik. Okay sir thank you so much sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough responses.

- Customer says inquiries are often fake.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of consistent usage.

- Executive explained the competition in all over India.

- Executive offered to share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested using the mobile app.

- Executive closed the service-related query.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect again tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, mobile app, visibility
